channel.title: Positioning Text In Menus

item.title: Positioning Text In Menus
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

How does runescape do this? For example I have this:

public void InfoMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@cya@Corrupted Scape Info", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@gre@Elemental Help Guide", 8145);
				sendQuest("Line 1", 8149);
				sendQuest("Line 2", 8151);
			        sendQuest("Line 3", 8152);
				sendQuest("Line 4", 8153);
				sendQuest("Line 5", 8154);
				sendQuest("Line 6", 8155);
				sendQuest("Line 7", 8156);
				sendQuest("Line 8", 8157);
				sendQuest("Line 9", 8158); 		
                               	sendQuest("Line 10", 8159);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}

Corrupted Scape Info is on the very top and to the very left,
the next in centered,
line 1 is down a bit more,
line 2 is down a lot more,
and so on.

What do I change to change the positioning of the text??
Thank you

Read full topic
